comments.body: It would be good to create a JIRA number for this and then reference it in the documentation.
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -129,6 +128,10 @@ Java 8 tests are run when -Pjava8-tests profile is enabled, they will run in spi
 For these tests to run your system must have a JDK 8 installation. 
 If you have JDK 8 installed but it is not the system default, you can set JAVA_HOME to point to JDK 8 before running the tests.
 
+## Building for PySpark on YARN ##
